He was paid 10000 dollars.
He was paid 10,000 dollars.
He kept me waiting for an hour.
He suckered me out of ten dollars.
I owe him 1,000 dollars.
He is a good match for me.
He deserves a promotion.
He is able to do it better than I am.
He can do it better than I can.
No matter what he may do, he will be praised.
He could do it.
He can say such things.
He is doing a super job.
I'm sure he can give you a good game of tennis.
tr: Eminim sana iyi bir tenis maçı oynatır.

en: He'll always come through.
He is good for five thousand dollars.
We may as well begin without him.
It is no use talking to him. He never listens.
It doesn't pay to talk with him.
Keep off the religious issue when talking with him.
Please don't cut in while I'm talking with him.
Did you ever talk to him?
I want to have a talk with him.
I want to talk with him.
It's no use arguing with him.
I want to contact him. Do you know his phone number?
tr: Ona ulaşmak istiyorum. Telefon numarasını biliyor musun?

en: Could you get in touch with him?
I am meeting him next Friday.
He and his friend sat on the bench.
We can just about read each other's minds.
He and I are such close friends that we can almost read each other's minds.
tr: O ve ben o kadar yakın arkadaşız ki neredeyse birbirimizin aklını okuyabiliyoruz.

en: You'd better not keep company with him.
I found it difficult to get along with him.
He is difficult to get along with.
Don't keep company with him.
He and she got married three years ago.
When he got her alone for a moment, he asked for a date.
tr: Onu bir an yalnız yakalayınca, randevu istedi.

en: A gulf divided him from them.
tr: Onu onlardan ayıran bir uçurum vardı.

en: It is easy to tell him from his brother.
I cannot tell him from his brother.
I can't tell him apart from his brother.
I am no more diligent than he is.
You as well as he are diligent.
tr: Hem sen hem de o çalışkansınız.

en: I, as well as he, am not convinced.
tr: Ben de o da ikna olmadık.

en: When I talked with him on the phone, he sounded tired.
tr: Onunla telefonda konuşurken sesi yorgun geliyordu.

en: No one can cope with him.
I want to come to terms with him.
I fell into company with him.
Have you known him for a long time?
How long have you known him?
I have known him for two years.
I got to know him.
I had to meet him halfway.
You should have nothing to do with him.
You must not keep in touch with him.
You must not come in contact with him.
He is my namesake, but no relation.
He and I share a room.
He and I are bosom friends.
He and I are childhood friends.
He and I are teachers.
He and I are brothers.
He and I stayed at the hotel.
He and I can not speak Spanish.
He and I discussed the waste problem in terms of recycling.
tr: Onunla geri dönüşümle ilgili atık sorununu konuştuk.

en: He and I are classmates.
He and I are cousins.
He and I walked together.
His ideas conflict with mine.
I have nothing in common with him.
He and I are pretty much the same build.
tr: Onunla aşağı yukarı aynı fiziğe sahibiz.

en: Who is younger, he or I?
tr: Kim daha genç, o mu, ben mi?

en: Who is younger, him or me?
tr: Kim daha genç, o mu, ben mi?

en: It is no use arguing with him.
I don't intend to marry him.
I would rather die than marry him.
No sooner had I come into contact with him than I determined to get to know him well.
tr: Onunla tanışır tanışmaz onu iyi tanımaya karar verdim.

en: It is vain to argue with him.
It is no use trying to argue with him.
Why did you turn away when you met him?
I was happy to see him.
I'm looking forward to seeing him.
I hesitated to go to the movie with him.
I can't bear to work with him.
I'm going fishing with him.
Those whom he lived with respected him.
tr: Birlikte yaşadığı kişiler ona saygı duyuyordu.

en: I used to go to school with him.
I had to choose going with him or staying here alone.
tr: Onunla gitmeyi ya da burada yalnız kalmayı seçmek zorundaydım.

en: I don't want to be seen in his company.
I don't want to be seen with him.
I feel comfortable in his company.
I feel secure with him.
I disputed with him about world peace for an hour.
tr: Onunla dünya barışı üzerine bir saat tartıştım.

en: Unlike him, his son is tall.
If you disagree with him, he is liable to get angry.
Shake hands with him.
He is a childhood friend.
I once sat at the same table with him at a dinner party.
tr: Bir keresinde onunla bir yemekte aynı masada oturdum.

en: I am on good terms with him.
I'm on good terms with him.
I just can't get along with him.
I met him for the first time.
He's just a business associate.

He and I have been inseparable friends since our student days.
